name: Jelly Bomber (itch) (DrZanuff)
description:
Destroy all evil Jellies! You can play in desktop or in mobile. Flick the bomb and explode all Jellies.

Controls:

-Flick the bomb a make it hit the jellies.

Features:

-Mouse and Touch support.

-Intuitive GamePlay.

- Overall 30 levels divided by 3 worlds.

- Complete a level without losing a life to gain 3 stars.

- Save the progress of your game, so you can return later.
